file(COPY  README bad-device-line.cir bad-device-line.cir.sh extra-space.cir extra-space.cir.sh tags worse-device-line.cir worse-device-line.cir.sh options DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/bad-device-line.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/extra-space.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/worse-device-line.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_401/bad-device-line.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bad-device-line.cir.sh $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bad-device-line.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_401/bad-device-line.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_401/bad-device-line.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;errorexit")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_401/bad-device-line.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} bad-device-line.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce>" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} bad-device-line.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_401/bad-device-line.cir.prn )

endif()

endif()
